website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers Arch Fit is engineered to deliver a comfortable walking experience to people with foot issues. It has built-in support under the arch, which prevents overpronation and relieves pain for those with plantar fasciitis. It looks like your typical athletic trainer which makes it easy to pair with casual attire. The Arch Fit insole is removable, so you can easily swap it with your orthotics if needed. It comes highly recommended to be used for daily walks and traveling.
pros: A vast majority of reviewers are ecstatic with the comfort offered by the Skechers Arch Fit
A good number of people with flat feet or plantar fasciitis reveal that this pair of walking shoes relieved discomfort
Because of the Arch Fit insole, a lot of wearers have not used their custom orthotics
According to multiple purchasers, this model was lightweight despite having supporting elements
The overall design and style appeal to a lot of shoppers
cons: A few users wish that the cushioning under the heel was plush for softer landings
The flat shoelaces did not please a couple of owners

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT slip on as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: These are lace up despite stating twice that they are slip on in the advert. I assumed they were bungee laces but they're not. Very irritating. Good quality just not what was advertised and not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Still Single -Why?

customer_reviews.title: Happy at first but then disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased initially with these trainers, very comfortable and a good fit. However, after only 3.5 months after moderate wear they are splitting where the fabric joins the sole on one of them - you would not expect this after such a short amount of time for the price paid. No clear information on how to contact the seller to discuss this further, hence this review and the low overall 2-star score. Would welcome a response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Titley

customer_reviews.title: Good but not slip on
customer_reviews.text: Shoes as usual for sketchers are great but as others have said they are not slip on. Bought them for that reason as my husband cant bend with back problem Had to buy stretch laces for £6. Better but not great. Please change advert
customer_reviews.author: PatWallasey

customer_reviews.title: Wore down easily
customer_reviews.text: Very good for support however the left trainer has started to crack on the back must be a plastic support or something so I'm guessing they won't last much longer now.
customer_reviews.author: scott byrne

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trainers with exceptional comfort at a n extremely competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Great Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well before due date. So comfortable and perfect fit. Love them. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth Archbold

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Had Skechers before , they are the best for me as my job involves been on my feet most of the day , these have been the best ones yet
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product fits like a glove and so comfy. Arrived early and well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size but were slightly small, went for 1/2 size bigger after returning first pair. They fit like a glove from the start. These are my first pair of sketchers and instantly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Carney

customer_reviews.title: Another perfect "buy me" from Skechers.
customer_reviews.text: The style is excellent, all up to Skechers first class standard and value.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Irene Nichol

customer_reviews.title: great cushioned soles.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful comfort and support. Soles are like cushions and feet don't get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: W J PEARCE

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very comfortable as you would expect from sketchers
customer_reviews.author: Andy M

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but not a slip on
customer_reviews.text: the shoe is a lace up, not what i wanted (it is advertised as a slip on)but still a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Ian B Murray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time, the high arch felt a little strange to start with but after an hr or so the feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I tore a ligament in my foot, and these are really comfortable, giving me the support I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Culley Lewis

customer_reviews.title: trainers
customer_reviews.text: these seem great vert supportive in the house ,they are a Christmas present soi cant go out in them yet ,hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: chas bradley

customer_reviews.title: The fit is spot on.
customer_reviews.text: These sketchers fitted perfectly, as expected, they look and feel great,definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bridge

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Arch Fit Slip On Trainers
product_meta.description: Arch fit engineered mesh lace-up sneaker.
